name: Bean (itch) (DerpiFlea174)
description:
Bean- Derpi's first ever 3D game that is trash... no just kidding the graphics are AMAZING!!!

This game is coming out on Mac as well, just not now.

Controls: WASD Keys to move around, obviously the left mouse key to shoot, the mouse to look around (duhhh), left shift to sprint, left control to crouch, and... yea. Basic FPS controls, am i right? (what am i doing with my life)

Completely developed in Unity3D

Credits: Unity3D, Brackeys, Dave/GameDevelopment, STREEM, SEPI, FLEAFLOWER180, HONEYTEA.FLOWER and many other people I cant remember at this point tbh :(

Thanks for checking out the page and SMASH THAT DOWNLOAD BUTTON, GAMERS!
